SELECT student_code, student_name, student_phone, student_grade, password, student_status, major_subject, tutor_professor FROM tb_student
JOIN tb_subject on major_subject = subject_code
WHERE
student_code = #{value}
student_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
major_subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
student_status = #{value}
ORDER BY student_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_student (student_name, student_phone, student_grade, password, student_status, major_subject, tutor_professor) VALUES (#{studentName}, #{studentPhone}, #{studentGrade}, #{password}, #{studentStatus}, #{majorSubject}, #{tutorProfessor})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_student
student_name = #{studentName},
student_phone = #{studentPhone},
student_grade = #{studentGrade},
password = #{password},
student_status = #{studentStatus},
major_subject = #{majorSubject},
tutor_professor = #{tutorProfessor},
WHERE student_code = #{studentCode}
